title: PDDikti v2 Web
short_desc: PDDikti is a collection of higher education implementation data from all universities that have been integrated nationally. The PDDikti web can be used to check data on higher education related things.

title: Andal Web App
short_desc: Andal web is a child safety application that can monitor the location of children using geofencing and context-aware computing. If the child goes outside the boundaries determined by the parent, a notification will be sent.

title: IoT-Based Monitoring and Automation System Web
short_desc: This is a web app for an IoT based Monitoring and Automation System for Integrated Laying Hens Cage Environment. This project was build to accomplish my Capstone Project. Capstone project is a final college project that lasts 1 year. The result of this project is an engineering product related to electrical and information engineering.

title: Jogja Smart Service (JSS) - Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Page
contrib: React.js, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and TailwindCSS
short_desc: Internship project at Dinas Komunikasi Informatika dan Persandian Kota Yogyakarta. Developed the FAQ service on the Jogja Smart Service web application using MERN stack. Responsible for front-end, back-end, and database configuration. Worked in a team of three.
